Replace.Text: Three tile natural wonder. Provides +5 [ICON_Science] Science to adjacent tiles. Units that enter it are teleported to an ocean far away, but naval units that do so earn the ability 'Mysterious Currents' (+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement).

"There is, one knows not what sweet mystery about this sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath … for here, millions of mixed shades and shadows, drowned dreams, somnambulisms, reveries; all that we call lives and souls, lie dreaming, dreaming, still."[NEWLINE]– Herman Melville

One tile natural wonder. Provides +4 [ICON_Science] Science, +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Fresh Water. Land combat units that enter it receive the ability 'Water of Life' (+10 HP healing in any territory).

"Chyavana, desirous of obtaining beauty, quickly entered into the water. The twin Aswins also, O King, sank into the sheet of water. And the next moment, they all came out … in surpassingly beautiful forms, and young."[NEWLINE]- Anonymous
Three tile impassable natural wonder. Provides +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture to adjacent tiles. Major adjacency bonus to Theater Square and Commercial Hub districts.
"Hidden in the glorious wildness like unmined gold."[NEWLINE]- John Muir
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from the adjacent natural wonder Païtiti.
